entries.original: feat(ux): added text wrapping capabilities to markdown tables

entries.original: chore(release): bump version to 0.30.0-nightly.20260210.a2174751d
entries.translated: 버전을 0.30.0-nightly.20260210.a2174751d로 업데이트

entries.original: chore: cleanup unused and add unlisted dependencies in packages/core
entries.translated: `packages/core`에서 사용되지 않는 의존성 정리 및 누락된 의존성 추가

entries.original: chore(core): update activate_skill prompt verbiage to be more direct

entries.original: Add autoconfigure memory usage setting to the dialog

entries.original: fix(core): prevent race condition in policy persistence
entries.translated: 정책 영속성 처리 중 발생하는 경합 상태 방지

entries.original: fix(evals): prevent false positive in hierarchical memory test

entries.original: feat(cli): add setting to hide shortcuts hint UI

entries.original: feat(core): formalize 5-phase sequential planning workflow
entries.translated: 5단계 순차적 계획 워크플로우 정형화

entries.original: perf(ui): optimize table rendering by memoizing styled characters

entries.original: perf(cli): truncate large debug logs and limit message history

entries.original: fix(core): cache CLI version to ensure consistency during sessions
